rows.label: qst202011_msg001
rows.name: We gave her the Fruity Rice Ball.

rows.label: qst202011_msg002
rows.name:
She said she give you big telling off
later!

rows.label: qst202011_msg003
rows.name: I still think you made her day, though.

rows.label: qst202011_msg004
rows.name:
Heck, there's no getting past her,
is there? I'll have to brace myself
then, won't I? Ha ha ha!

rows.label: qst202011_msg005
rows.name: Urrggh *cough cough hack*

rows.label: qst202011_msg006
rows.name: Hey! Are youokay, mister?

rows.label: qst202011_msg007
rows.name: *cough cough splutter*

rows.label: qst202011_msg008
rows.name: Me go call Musubi!

rows.label: qst202011_msg009
rows.name:
W-wait! *cough cough* I'll be...
*pant pant* I'll be fine...

rows.label: qst202011_msg010
rows.name:
There's no use worrying the lass.
I'd appreciate it if you could keep
this quiet from her.

rows.label: qst202011_msg011
rows.name: Yeah, but...

rows.label: qst202011_msg012
rows.name:
I'm fine. Don't you worry, I'm
not going to keel over and kick
the bucket just yet.

rows.label: qst202011_msg013
rows.name:
That reminds me... Mind if I bother
you with one more little errand?

rows.label: qst202011_msg014
rows.name: You want us to get some medicine?

rows.label: qst202011_msg015
rows.name:
Medicine? No.
Let's see... It was about...30 years ago
now, back when I was still serving.

rows.label: qst202011_msg016
rows.name:
Me and Musubi, we got our hands on
a pair of golden bracers.

rows.label: qst202011_msg017
rows.name: Whoa!

rows.label: qst202011_msg018
rows.name: Yeah. A rare find, isn't it?

rows.label: qst202011_msg019
rows.name:
We were never particularly pressed
for money back in those days, so we
decided to hide 'em.

rows.label: qst202011_msg020
rows.name: I want you to bring 'em back for me.

rows.label: qst202011_msg021
rows.name: Okay, can do. Where did you put them?

rows.label: qst202011_msg022
rows.name:
In the Fief of Forgetfulness in
Superbia.

rows.label: qst202011_msg023
rows.name: Thing is, according to Musubi...

rows.label: qst202011_msg024
rows.name: According to Musubi...?

rows.label: qst202011_msg025
rows.name:
Ah, perfect timing! I was asking Rex
here if he wouldn't mind fetching those
old bracers we buried back in the day.

rows.label: qst202011_msg026
rows.name: In the Fief of Forgetfulness, wasn't it?

rows.label: qst202011_msg027
rows.name: No, no, I think you've gotten mixed up.

rows.label: qst202011_msg028
rows.name:
It was at the Ruins of Fountain Park
in the Kingdom of Invidia, as I recall.

rows.label: qst202011_msg029
rows.name:
Oh, er...was it? I don't remember
burying them there...

rows.label: qst202011_msg030
rows.name:
No, I'm positive. It was definitely in
Invidia.

rows.label: qst202011_msg031
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: qst202011_msg032
rows.name:
Oh, I don't know any more.
Check the both of those places
and they'll turn up eventually!

rows.label: qst202011_msg033
rows.name: Wow. Talk about careless...

rows.label: qst202011_msg034
rows.name:
Well if he can't remember, I guess
there's no way around it. We'll just
have to check both of those places out.
